article_title: Medicaid cuts could cost Ada hospital $2.5 million
article_text:
Ada, OK (74820)

Today

Thunderstorms likely this morning. Then the chance of scattered thunderstorms this afternoon. A few storms may be severe. High 76F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%..

Tonight

Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. A stray severe thunderstorm is possible. Low around 65F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

article_metadata.author: ERIC SWANSON | Staff Writer

og.description: Mercy Hospital Ada stands to lose about $2.5 million if the state follows through on a proposal to cut Medicaid reimbursement rates this summer.
